website_summaries.verdict: Every crime-fighting kiddo and their trusty sidekicks need the right headquarters to plan their next rescue and relax after a hard day’s work. Ideal for action figure aficionados, this set boasts a host of fun features and accessories.
pros: Offering 3 floors and 12 rooms, including lower-level garages, a gym, strategy-planning offices, a floor-to-ceiling firefighter’s pole, and more, this set has everything a kid and his action figures could need
Includes a helicopter, firetruck, and police motorcycle, along with two flexible action figures and a dog
Lots of little details and sturdy construction
cons: Lots of parts and complicated instructions can make assembly a chore

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a lot of the toys that are shown in other pictures are were missing, but they would have probably ended up broken. Just after a month, most of the toys broke. Just know that you are not getting what you're paying for. I ended up buying separate accessories that actually hold up. Very disappointed but my son still enjoys playing with it. I will not buy from kidcraft anymore, I thought they were a reputable brand since the prices are always so high in toysrus but clearly I was wrong. The picture shows just SOME of the broken toys because others just ultimately got tossed into the trash. I am going to try and fix these ones.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brown

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty nice except we are missing one of the dogs, dog bed, toilet and kidkraft has not replied to my email about getting these items. Also I'm not sure about the ones where people only had to screw in a few things bc I am putting this whole thing together. That's fine with me, my kids are excited and playing as we go. My son loves our Barbie house but he also loves fire trucks so this is really cool. The only problem is the missing parts and lack of customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Shoaib Zaman

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Required
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it seems like a sturdy toy. It does take some time to assemble so if you're giving it as a gift, make sure to keep that in mind. The child won't be able to enjoy it until assembly is complete. Also, some areas of paint on the wood pieces seem to flake off rather easily; particularly, the doors. It doesn't take much of a scratch from a fingernail to remove the paint. This was discovered accidentally. However, overall the product seems sturdy. Comes with great accessories for the rescue house, including a firetruck and police motorcycle. Good purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bonme

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow this is darling! My boys LOVE this and I like that it folds up to store. I've had no issues with this. It's well made and sturdy. No broken pieces. My boys are 1 and 2 and it gets played with everyday. I always find dinosaurs or Batman in this when I'm cleaning up at the end of the day 😂 it's great for imagination. I LOVE that it doesn't make any noise and that the kids themselves have to make their noises. Really encourages them to work their little brains, instead of just pushing a button to make a fire alarm go off.
customer_reviews.author: message me

customer_reviews.title: Amazing engineering and craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: So much to say...The packaging concerned me at first. But It was all there. I took inventory and even placed all the pieces in order and numbered them. I did this because of all the horrible reviews. Well, this was not necessary as I discovered they were already numbered. I put this together in a little over an hour. But, it was perfectly engineered and came together beautifully. The only thing I would change is the order of inserting the pole. This should come before the top is placed but other than that, this was absolutely perfect. I can't wait to give this to my grandson this weekend. It is so adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Diane B.

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money for a quality toy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this toy. I bought it for my 6 yr old grandson's birthday because he wanted a "boy's dollhouse". It is very sturdy and comes with several figures and furniture plus a helicopter, motorcycle and fire engine. Its really big and accommodates all the other toys he likes to stuff in it.. The only bad part is it did take me an hour to put it together and the instructions are not the clearest I've ever read. However, I feel it was all worth it when I see how much he loves playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Fun lasts years....
customer_reviews.text: Being stuck at home for 30+ days ive finally Managed to catch up on reviewing some of my past purchases. Please excuse me as i review a product i purchased well over 4 years ago. This firestation has endured alot, its been moved from 3 different homes, played with by countless kids, and besides a few scratches and bite marks on some of the furniture it is still in great shape. We originally purchased it for my then 2 year old, fast forwars few years later he is now 7 and plays with it with his 1 year old brother. All of the furniture picture and characters where included with ours. Assembling it did take some time but was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Toyzandnoise

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday present!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons 3rd birthday and it has been a smashing success. He plays with it for hours every day. Love that he can use his imagination. I found the instructions to be fairly easy to follow for the build. All pieces were numbered so that helped a lot. A picture of the finished product on the instructions would have been nice but I kept referring back to the pictures on Amazon. I didn't buy the set for the accessories since my son already has a million toy cars and legos I knew he'd enjoy using with it. So far it's held up pretty well despite my son climbing on it daily.
customer_reviews.author: daniela

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my 4 YO son
customer_reviews.text: My son's preschool has a similar one that he loves but that one is over $200 so we opted for this one. Mommy and daddy are very happy with it and so is he. I can't really say it was difficult to put together but it was very time consuming. Directions are very simple to follow but there are a lot of parts and pieces. The description isn't clear so I feel like I should clarify that all the furniture, vehicles and fire and police men are included. Highly recommend this for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Sukiasian

customer_reviews.title: Great Fire 🏠
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 3 year old boy as a bday gift. Him and his 4 year old sister are craazy about this house. I enjoy all the wooden pieces. We played with them too LOL. These toys can not get wet so be very weary of how they are handled. When we opened the box, we thought it'd be impossible to put together in a short amount of time but my husband and I took about an hr. to bring it to life. If you place all the pieces on the floor and by numbers, it should be pretty easy to assemble. Overall, I loved it ! and my kids are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun for little ones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my preschool classroom. Only 1-2 children can play with it at any time. It was quite confusing to put together. I would have liked written directions to accompany the illustrations. Two pieces were not marked with a number indicating which piece it was. All in all we figured it out (two of us together) and the children LOVE it. A few of the little accessories that come with it have broken easily (door came off of the oven and a leg came off of a table- those things can be easily fixed with wood glue).
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Your kids will love it
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son was absolutely thrilled to open this gift for his birthday! He just loves moving all the pieces around and coming up with scenarios for the police and firefighter. He puts other toys in there as well. I was relieved it wasn’t quite as big as I expected. My son sits on the floor to play. My only complaint is that there are roughly 48 pieces to put together, so it took me almost 3 hours to assemble it. Also, there are some flaws in the way the pieces are cut because they don’t always fit perfectly into one another.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Wade

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and cute
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic Christmas gift for 3 of our grandsons, ages 3, 5 and 7. My husband and I put 2 of these together and it took about 3 hours from start to complete finish. Directions were easy. I was amazed at how many accessories came with the item. The boys spend hours playing with this. It was very colorful and loved the fact that it closes up into a square box!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful gift for our 3.5 year old. He enjoys playing with it and doesn't seem to have the troubles other reviews pointed out... for instance, he doesn't mind that the figures don't fit under the desk while sitting in the chair. It is good quality and stands up well so far (one month). It was NOT simple to put together... thankfully my husband doesn't mind 100 pieces and instructions. It took one hour. It was worth it... this is now a central toy in my son's playroom!
customer_reviews.author: A. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: I saw an older version of just the firehouse at my friends and decided to buy this for my four year olds birthday. Within the first day the helicopter broke and ladder broke off the firetruck. As previous reviews state, the included people can't sit or use the furniture included. People don't fit easily down the fireman pole either. The dog barely stands because it's legs were flat out to the sides when we received it. Not worth the price and would definitely not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Overpeck

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY POOR QUALITY. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been INCREDIBLY disappointing. For the price and brand name, I imagined that we were getting a high quality product, yet we are constantly dealing with broken “wood”, tiny screws falling off (and we have younger kids around which is terribly dangerous), wires popping out of the little people and wheels coming off of the cars. I reached out to the company and they were completely unhelpful and unapologetic. I was shocked. I would absolutely not purchase this product again and would advise against bringing it into a home with younger children due to screws and small pieces showing up all over the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun toy!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this gift to my firefighting obsessed little boy for his 3rd birthday. He absolutely LOVES it! Quality is good and it is providing him with lots of great imaginative play time. My only caution is it takes a good while to assemble. Will be handy to have an electric/battery operated philips head screwdriver. You may want to consider assembling ahead of time. Took me (mom) about 2 hours start to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves this!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our 3 year old for Christmas. While it was a pain to put together, not untypical for KidKraft products, he definitely loves it and 3-4 is a great age for this. It did arrive slightly damaged and one of the vehicles was broken. I love the concept and the size it nice and I like that it closes up. My son is always attracted to dollhouse type toys and I loved this "boy" alternative. He spend several hours on Christmas just driving the fire truck around making fire truck noises and driving it in and out of the playset!
customer_reviews.author: Suprmn001

customer_reviews.title: Must follow directions carefully
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews BUT after reading a lot of the reviews of this product I was almost hesitant to purchase it...but I’m glad I did! My son is absolutely obsessed with firemen, specifically Fireman Sam so this was perfect! Ours came with ALL the pieces & the instructions were relatively easy to follow. The quality is great for $80 and I was able to build it in about an hour. Overall considering how much most toys cost, I think this is a great value for your money & would highly recommend to anyone who’s son loves firemen/policemen.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this play set!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this--! Be ready to spend a little time assembling it, but instructions are great and the next one (if they are ever available again) is going to be much easier. Love that it folds together to close up. Sturdy construction, realistic accessories (our son in law is a fireman)and his little boy knew what everything was and where it should go) We all enjoyed playing with it. Great detail (down to the water dish for the dog) tried to order a second one for an upcoming birthday and they are OUT but as soon as they are available, I'm a customer again. Service was great, it arrived when it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Was a much better Quailty than I expected real sturdy even the Accessories everything felt like real wood the pieces of the walls were double-sided, so maybe for the average person it would be hard to put together I have No problem with that it was well marked just be prepared to put it together lots and lots of pieces but once I got it together I thought it was great my grandson is going to love it
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Cohen

customer_reviews.title: What a great Play set!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 3 year old grandson, because he was mesmerized with his cousin's doll house. When it came, it had to be put together. There are a LOT of pieces. It's not hard t put together, just time consuming. I am a 59 year old woman and I put it together completely by myself. The furniture is all wooden and very sturdy! I gave it to him for Christmas and he is STILL playing with it to this day. He absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Anna O.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my almost 4 yr old. He loves it! The instructions were lacking. Make sure you color match the screws to the right place. Our fire pole was too big so my husband had to trim it to fit. Make sure you insert the floors so the white is showing on the outside. Super cute. Hope it lasts for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for boys and girls!
customer_reviews.text: I am so grateful for the review and assembly tips from “ThatMommy84” The directions were confusing and without enough details. I screenshot this review and referred to it many times while putting this together. Kidcraft should hire you to do an assembly video. Love all the wooden furniture that is large enough for younger kids to handle. I know my grandsons will spend lots of time playing with this
customer_reviews.author: Firefly

customer_reviews.title: Not the most sturdy toy.
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised with so many 5 star reviews on just how bad the quality is. My husband had to add his own bigger screws into the roof as the screws they provided just pulled out. The screws in the hinges just fell out with my son just opening and closing the house. It's just not a very sturdy built toy so I'm worried how long it will hold up. It gets 3 stars only because my son loves it and has played with it every day since getting it for Christmas. The details are nice, we don't use the people who came with it. It has become his superhero headquarters.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Fell to pieces within months!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this toy! It was a gift from my mom to my toddler son and within months piece by piece it just kept falling apart. The sides/walls don’t stay together and they fall off. The doors are unstable and fall off. Nothing really stays together. I tried to contact the company about it twice, but I haven’t heard back from them. It’s adorable for sure but I don’t recommend if you’re going to pay the money and it falls apart very easily without the hope that you would get a replacement. It’s just cardboard covered with stickers with one wooden beam of support and the metal pole on the inside. Not well made!
customer_reviews.author: karisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Toy, Comes with SOOO Much Stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my almost 3 year old. This toy is a great price for the quality of wood and paint your getting. My kids loved it, they couldnt even wait til it was fully assembled before playing with the toy furniture that comes with it. The wood carved furniture is absolutely adorable. If your like me and hate the artificial plastic houses and furniture they make now, then tou will love this set its almost " collectable" and something to keep in the family from one generation to the next. Also it folds close for easy storage. This was definitely worth it my3 and 5 yr old played with this for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son received this as a birthday present and LOVED it! He really likes the vehicles - fire engine, motorcycle, and helicopter - and the fact that the people bend to ride them. I like that it folds up easily and everything fits inside. It did take me a while to put it together, but instructions were fairly helpful. Pieces were all numbered, nothing was missing. I would recommend for young kids, boys and girls (we have girl cousins and friends that also love it). Maybe not for homes with babies learning to walk. Small furniture pieces have rounded edges, but actual building has sharp outside corners.
customer_reviews.author: UTmom

customer_reviews.title: Pre-drilled holes are too large for the screws, falls apart easily
customer_reviews.text: I don't mind this play house. But i have had it for just a few days over a month and my daughter has maybe played with it 6 times and there is already pieces breaking. This comes with pre-drilled holes to screw into but i found the holes were too big... So i have pieces coming apart because the screws will not stay in the pre-drilled holes. Additional the fire and police guys clothes (paint color) are peeling off. I don't think the quality is there for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy Powers

customer_reviews.title: A Christmas hit!
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t had this long so I can’t comment on durability, or really much at all - but I will say this was a Christmas hit and my 3 year old absolutely adores this! It does take a solid hour to assemble. The figures are not that great, but we use our fireman Sam figures more than anything with this, as well as the dinosaur shown...but that’s ok, I wasn’t buying it for the 2 figures. I think it will be played with often enough to make the price well worth it. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YES.....YES....YES!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about getting this for my 2.5 and 5 year old for Christmas. It did not disappoint. Easy to put together and super cute. Just like I had hoped....a doll house for boys....or girls if this is what they are into. Wood....not plastic and lots of furniture to play with. I think we will be buying more of these kidkraft play sets in the future.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: My child loved opening this on Christmas Day
customer_reviews.text: My toddler requested a dollhouse for Christmas, and this fit the specifications for a boy who loves superheroes and fire trucks! My child loved opening this on Christmas Day. I am only giving it four stars because it took about four hours to put together due to the multiple small pieces and difficult to read instructions, and one of the pieces was cracked on opening the box. Luckily, I read plenty of reviews beforehand that stated the colored screws were to match the different colors on the boards as this was not specified in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It took my husband and I an hour to put this together and it was worth it! Instructions were easy to read and understand and all the pieces were there. It looks great! My 2 year old son loves it! His favorite pieces are the vehicles. It's so nice to have this set as it's not commercialized from a cartoon or tv show... Leaving him with so much opportunities to use his imagination. We all adore this "play station".
customer_reviews.author: A. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Fun Imaginitive Play
customer_reviews.text: Our three and a half year old son loves this!! I wanted to get him something that would make him use his imagination a little bit and he does! He usually wants us to play it with him, but he plays on his own too! It definitely takes some time to put together, but it's pretty straightforward. I do (kind of) wish the bell was a real bell, but maybe I'd regret that.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift for 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my 5 year old. It did take a while for my husband to put together but he said the directions were very thorough. Both of my kids (5 and 2) have gotten enjoyment from it so far. The figures are bendable which is also really cool!
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: I hate to write bad reviews, and honestly I never have. But this was my son's Christmas present and it's the day after Christmas and it's literally falling apart. My husband worked hard putting it together for over 2 hours...today I went to gently move it to another location and it just started falling apart. And then literally my 3 year old was able to pull it apart piece by piece. Very disappointed in this product. However I will give one star for the fire truck, and motor cycle it comes with. My son loves those.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Gautreau

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for a little boys
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toy for my fire truck and police officer little boy for his 4th birthday. The colors are vibrant and the quality is very good for the price! Very easy to assemble took me about 30 minutes to put it together while watching tv. Toys remind me is Melissa and doug. I cannot wait to give this to my son! He is going to use this for hours on hours!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my grandsons 5th birthday. He loved it! He yelled “that’s incredible” when he saw it. His cousins that are 2 and 3 loved playing with it too. It was easy to assemble. I think it is a great toy for boys or girls with bright colors and accessories that all the kids enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't have come up with a better present for him
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my three-and-a-half year old grandson for Christmas. Wow, I couldn't have come up with a better present for him. My daughter (his mother) gave me many choices for presents (I asked her for suggestions). She said he continued to be interested in doll houses, but she didn't want a girlie doll house for him. He's a little boy who loves trucks, airplanes, etc, the louder the better. So the fire and police stations were perfect for him. It's well-made, has great little interior things to play with, and folds up in a tidy box for storage. He still loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Shoshone Sally

customer_reviews.title: Price fluctuates
customer_reviews.text: This is a great firehouse. I put this together in two hours by myself (so proud)! My 2.5 year old loves it and we looked for a set for weeks. Happy with the purchase. Unhappy though about the price. I paid $108 and now see it for $88! Buy it now since the price fluctuates!
customer_reviews.author: VAMom76

customer_reviews.title: A big hit!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandson went nuts over this at Christmas! I was able to put it together myself with just a Phillips screwdriver. Word of warning....the screws are separated by length, but also by color. The directions don’t indicate which color. Use the color that matches the wood where you’re placing the screw. The accessories are awesome and bigger than I expected, and the bendable figures are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent but may not last long!
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute & could keep a kiddo busy for a while however the design isn’t painted on. It’s a sticker over wood & the edges peel up VERY easily. A few peeled up just putting it together! Also, there are different color screws for different peices but the instructions do not specify. Pay close attention to the colors on the screw heads!
customer_reviews.author: Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best toy I have ever purchased for him
customer_reviews.text: gift for my 5 year old grandson. This is the best toy I have ever purchased for him. It is very well made and provides hours of entertainment for himand his little sister. II was so glad to find this alternative for a boy and his heroes. Love, Love, Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Gerr

customer_reviews.title: Great playhouse for my son!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old son absolutely loves this! It’s so fun, it folds up easily, and there are lot of ways to interact with it. It definitely took me a solid two hours to assemble by myself, but the look on his face made it totally worthwhile!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's birthday. My husband put it together with ease & it's waiting to be opened tomorrow morning. I'm excited to see him get this gift & I believe he will enjoy it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Sarrah

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I was hoping for:(
customer_reviews.text: Subpar quality. Fire engine arrived broken. I sent them photos and they wanted me to submit more pics and paperwork just to get a replacement part from their parts dept. I don’t feel I should of had to do all the leg work when this item arrived broken. The figures are strong but not very bendable to put on the vehicles and the dogs legs go out to the side so you really can’t stabd him up like kids want to do. The overall concept of the station is good imagination play.
customer_reviews.author: barb whittlef

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My husband put it together no problem. Had no malfunctions everything was there. Good quality. Love all the little accessories it comes with. My 2 year old daughter jacked it from my son lol.
customer_reviews.author: Mommabear

customer_reviews.title: playhouse
customer_reviews.text: bought for my grandson for christmas... he absolutely loves it ..... i would have given it a 5 if it was all real would like advertised ..... the toys are but the building itself is pressed would... it was easy to assembled and it keeps he entertained for hours...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this thing. It's sturdy enough that they don't destroy it. It took my husband a while to put it together but it's well worth it. I can actually drink a whole cup of tea in the morning, without reheating it a million times, while this keeps them busy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Arendas

customer_reviews.title: Lots of assembling but not difficult and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my 2 1/2 year old grandson and he LOVES it! It needs to be assembled, which took a little time, but all the pieces needed were in the box and enough screws, etc. we’re included. The pieces are well made and colorful. My grandson watched anxiously as his Dad put it together and he couldn’t wait to start playing with it and still was over an hour later. At last there is a toy house/building type of toy for a boy!
customer_reviews.author: LynnH

customer_reviews.title: Heavily made.
customer_reviews.text: This is made very well, solid wood and very heavy. Heavy usually means wonderful made but I wish it wasn’t quite so heavy. My grandson likes it to be brought in the great room for play. It folds up to save space but too heavy to keep moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Grandmom

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandsons 4th birthday. He loves it. Plays with it for hours at a time. My 8 yr old granddaughter plays with it all the time also, Its a very sturdy house and fairly easy to put together if you follow the instructions carefully. Very good product!!! Also its a very reasonable price for such good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 4, 5 or 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great doll house! My 5 year old has had hours of fun setting it up. The accessories are nicely made, constructed and mostly wooden. I did purchase some alternative people. The firemen that come with it are mediocre quality. Overall very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great “doll house” my son plays with it everyday! Not kidding.. it comes with the play pieces and he always ask me to play with him! Easy to put together for sure! For the nights you just want to have a glass of wine and the kids are driving you crazy.. just bring out the house and enjoy your 20mins 👍
customer_reviews.author: Christin

customer_reviews.title: Both of my sons love it one of them is 3 and the other ...
customer_reviews.text: Both of my sons love it one of them is 3 and the other is 9 and they both think its awesome... when i recieved this it was in pieces but it wasnt too hard to put together i was able to do it by myself with no help and im not handy at all. This play set comes with some furniture and little action figures. Its a very cute set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they suck, and you basically figure it out on your ...
customer_reviews.text: So SO CUTE! Directions really shouldn't have been put in the box, they suck, and you basically figure it out on your own, but it's not too hard and it's so cute when you're done. My only complaint is the firetruck and the plane come already assembled and the wheels are loose and you can't tighten. So worth the money though. We paid $72.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and unique design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old for Christmas. He absolutely loves it. It took a bit to put together and the directions are not the best but it was worth it. He loves fire trucks and police officers so it was the perfect, unique toy for him and his interests. It seems to be well made and is not flimsy. It’s actual wood not cardboard and plastic like many dollhouses.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Slade

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet??
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this toy. I was really disappointed in the fact that the two clips that hold together the bldg. when folded fell off in 1 hour of playing.
customer_reviews.author: Domenic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my two year old. He doesn’t get the concept of the furniture inside the Firehouse but he loves the house itself. It’s beautiful , a great price for this product. It looks scary to put together with all the piece but it was pretty easy!
customer_reviews.author: Kryslin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toy for children
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I gave this to our 5 yr. old grandson for Christmas. Very well built and durable toy. It came with furniture and figures. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This play set was very cute, but terrible quality. There were many dents and scratches, all of the corners were messed up, and the assembly instructions were terrible. Had this been a $20 or $30 toy I would not have been so disappointed, but for almost $90 I would expect more.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a pain to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I rate this 5 stars even though the screws come in different colors making putting this thing together a living you know what. You have to really look at the outside and think a few steps ahead to figure out what colors need to go where. My police station bottom left side didn't fit quite right but I made it work since it was a couple days before Christmas so I couldn't exchange it. On another note, this thing is excellent quality and the police motorcycle and fire truck make noises!
customer_reviews.author: AmberP2809

customer_reviews.title: Provides hours of fun for a toddler but assembly was a real chore
customer_reviews.text: Over the materials seem to be of good quality, there are enough features there to give a toddler hours of fun each day. However, did KidKraft listened the cryptic manual technology from IKEA or what? Putting the whole thing together was quite a chore and took more than an hour even with power tool help.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian H.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and sturdy toy ... only a couple minor complaints
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy. My 2.5 year old loves it! The only assembly required was screwing screws into a set of hinges and the screw holes weren't drilled large enough... had to muscle them in. Also, part of the laminate flooring in one of the rooms was coming up and damaged. Had to tape it down. Aside from that, I'd say it's very good quality. Solid as a rock. I don't think it comes with enough people and furniture. I guess that's how they get you to buy more. Anyhow, I still gave it 5 stars. It's not often you find nice wooden toys that hold a toddler's attention for long. This one does!
customer_reviews.author: oregongirl23

customer_reviews.title: Son says don’t call it a doll house!! Great product for boys!!
customer_reviews.text: This house was bought as a Christmas present for my son. I put together on Christmas Eve night and it wasn’t difficult. Took a little time to place the smaller items but all in all not bad. My son loves it and plays with daily, right next to his hot wheels. I would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Lands

customer_reviews.title: Durable and never forgotten
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic ! My 5 and 1 yo loves this toy!! We have one year with it now and is still often used! I would buy it again !!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: KidKraft ALWAYS has what I need!!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old son LOVES to play with his older sister's Doll House, so I wanted to get him something similar of his own for Christmas. This was the PERFECT 'doll house' for my very BOY-ish little boy!!!. He can move around the furniture, and play with the people, like he does with her dollhouse. The Firetruck, Motorcycle, and Helicopter are the perfect pieces to bring this play set together. The best part was it came ASSEMBLED!!! I had to put 4 screws in, which took me all of 3 minutes. Paid $115 a month before Christmas 2013. Worth Every Penny.
customer_reviews.author: ++SimplyAlli++

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this our only complaint is that the "people" ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this our only complaint is that the "people" it comes with barely fit on the furniture & aren't very flexible. Would recommend buying different figures.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Raineri

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: This play house has all the bells and whistles, plus it folds together when play is over. Comes with furniture and even the men
customer_reviews.author: fashion bran

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase for 4 year old grandson for Christmas. He loves it! Great quality. Should last for years. Only Gave 4 stars because the fire station bell is only plastic and doesn’t ring. Been great if it did. Also, There is no picture on instructions and that makes it harder to assemble. A picture of the product would have helped, but I did get it assembled without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Connie H.

customer_reviews.title: The best for my grandson hours & hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Awesome! But takes hrs to put together. Worth the smiles on my grandsons face in the end. He’s 4 yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: beverly amsterdam

customer_reviews.title: Children love this toy!!! Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set. Bought for a preschool classroom. The children LOVE it! It’s big and difficult to assemble but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri W.

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Way better than expected! And a decent size. My 4yr old is completely in love with his fire station/ police. Sorry, attached is the only picture I have right now.
customer_reviews.author: Lysnicole6

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present for my almost 3-year old son. He loves it. My husband had no trouble with assembly.
customer_reviews.author: lilart14

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously poor “instructions”
customer_reviews.text: RidiculousMy poor “instructions”. Took two adults two hours to assemble. Even a picture of the finished outside would have helped. I’m sure it will not last very long with even moderate play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Easy to Storage
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this product! Good quality and easy to storage. My son loves this little fire station. I highly recommend it! It took me a while to assemble it, but it was worth it. You do not need any extra tools, everything you need to assemble it is included. I am very satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: colvera

customer_reviews.title: Check color of screw head when assembling...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this play set. It seems very durable. Assembly instructions were terrible. All they would have needed was to package the screws differently and provide clearer instructions. Hint....check color of screw head so that it matches the color of the board that they are being screwed into. Took about 1 hour.
customer_reviews.author: maryh

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it! Got it for his 3rd birthday .. He actually picked this out and wanted it for his present. Made well, only thing I would change is the fake bell... A real bell would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: So cute and perfect!! Took awhile to put together but the ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute and perfect!! Took awhile to put together but the instructions were great and they had their little screws separated neatly. Really love this.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna bandanna

customer_reviews.title: KidKraft is High Quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought two KidKraft play sets for our 5 year old boys. They love the set. It is very high quality. Lots of detail. Many many many parts. We totally recommend this for pretend play.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked me to give this to my grandson on his 4th birthday. Though this is a great toy that is good for interaction and stimulates imagination, and my grandson is enjoying it, the assembly of this toy was a lot more than should be expected of parents. The instructions were not very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Doris R. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a pretty cool playset but I was very disappointed with the quality of this product, especially for the price of it. There were lots of Mark's on both the wood and plastic parts and when taking the stickers off some of the plastic doors the paint came right off. This is the first product I bought from kidkraft and the quality of it definitely turned me off to the brand. If it didnt come last minute for my 5 year olds birthday I probably would have returned it and looked for something similar from a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Our son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift for my 4 year old son. He LOVES it! Some cosmetic issues (nothing major), but overall a great product with all pieces included. Highly recommend for kiddos that love firefighters and policemen!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: It was a pain to figure out what screws went to what panel even though the screws are color coded and there are lots of panels and screws. However, once it was together it looks awesome and is sturdy. Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.author: KIB

customer_reviews.title: 7 years later still going strong
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this as a gift for my nephew. My son has had this for 7 years and he still plays with it from time to time. Despite it getting dinged up by rough play it has held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for younger children.
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren loved this gift. Enhances their imagination and sharing playtime activity.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Darrenkamp

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boys for christmas but decided to put it together before hand so i dont have to on christmas day and let me tell you, this thing is awesome!! 100% happy with it. It took awhile to assemble but its extremely sturdy and it also came with all the furniture seen in the picture. I can not wait to see their faces christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and play value very good on this one.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 5and 6 yr old great grandsons they absolutely love it. I did have to put it together was a little time consuming but went together easily with clear instructions. Quality nice and did order fireman Sam 5 piece figures to add to it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy ray rose

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Ordered
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons 6th birthday and it was a huge hit. It wasn't as hard to assemble as I thought it would be and it took almost 2 hours. Great quality especially on the furniture which is wood and durable. I loved that the guys are rubber and bend. I have a happy boy :)
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Vega

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 5,3,and1 year olds playing with this toy. It is a gray toy to play pretend and teach the kids simple things. The boys love the cars and helicopters. The girl loves the little chairs and furniture that cokes with the house. They can okay this for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Jayson S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this toy. He plays with it for hours. It is very sturdy and durable. Great product for the price. I bought extra people for this Playhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Licastro

customer_reviews.title: That being said- it's made of real wood and is a fantastic quality. I like that it looks like it'll ...
customer_reviews.text: There are a million pieces and it took me and my fiancé an hour to put the placehouse together. That being said- it's made of real wood and is a fantastic quality. I like that it looks like it'll last through the years. It's fun for little kids and older ones too with a little imagination!
customer_reviews.author: tiffany aufmann

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves this! It was a little tedious to put together but once we had it assembled it’s sturdy. Our grandson couldn’t wait for it to be assembled and was playing with it while we put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Maria O'Hare

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for something like this for my grandsons, like a dollhouse for boys. Something with rooms and furniture...this was it. I like the policeman and fireman but they don't sit so they use Playmobil little people which are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: DRMOHIO

customer_reviews.title: Best hero house in the market!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson wanted a house like his sister has and this was perfect. The best hero house ever! Now my granddaughter wants one like this too. We love that it folds shut for easy clean up. Everyone that saw this would like to have had one or wants to get one. Little boys need a doll (hero) house too.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi ma

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and held up much loner than expected with ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and held up much loner than expected with 2 very active young boys. Nothing is broken but we need to rebuild after the fire pole came loose it created a bit of a domino effect in that section.
customer_reviews.author: elda romero

customer_reviews.title: Such a great toy for an imaginative kid!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best christmas gifts we ever gave my son. It was easy to assemble (took about an hour, but very straight forward) and has withstood countless hours of play from both my 4 and 2 year old. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to assemble
customer_reviews.text: One negative thing for me is the assembly instructions are a bit confusion (no visual )picture didnt know the front or back side assemble for faster .i needed to see a picture by phone to double check if i put the piece the right way Will be better if color pictures took me about 2 hours But overall great toy my kid love it. Great material and colors Another Negative is after a month a piece broke from where is connected together
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: Boys dollhouse
customer_reviews.text: Oh, this is fantastic, bought it for our 3 year old grandson, he loved it! It is very sturdy and a breeze to put together! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: ann kerkhoff

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a lot of fun accessories. The people that come with it are ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5yo loves this! Comes with a lot of fun accessories. The people that come with it are weird and don’t bend properly and aren’t the right size to fit in the vehicles or accessories it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Breeze Sleep

product_meta.title: KidKraft Everyday Heroes Play Set
feature_bullets: 3 vehicles - a helicopter, police motorcycle and a fire truck
Folds up for quick and easy storage
Large enough for children to play together
3 Floors and 12 rooms of open space for fun creative play
